name: Starling
description:
Starling

Star, the descendant of it's tribe, wanders off. Finding it self in a cave. A cavern, home to a creature called Ling. Ling's like darkness, so they hang down from the ceiling, and they consume the mine's ores. They have a defensive instict, when they sense danger from someone, that's when they drop down, and inject the liquidated ores, thus accelerating one's hormone levels.

Note: Developers: Dániel Mikus - Programmer / Game Designer Dóra Mikus - Artist / Animator Mátyás Mészáros - Aritst / Animator Mária Lujzi Mondovics - Sound effect's / Audio Engineer

This is an improved version of this game, which I made for a 2 week gamejam:

As of current state (2020.06.22 / Monday), it's a demo version. More updates are coming, stay tuned! Please let us know, what you think!
